DOC.brief_summary: To identify patient characteristics associated with non-response after spine fusion surgery for the treatment of degenerative disc disease (DDD).
DOC.brief_title: Understanding Non-Response in Spine Fusion Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subject has diagnosis of degenerative disc disease Subject is undergoing lumbar spine fusion surgery Subject is less than 18 years of age Subject is not fluent in English Subject requires a caretaker for medical decision making
